name: ProtocolHandler.exe Downloaded Suspicious File
description: Emulates attack via documents through protocol handler in Microsoft Office. On successful execution you should see Microsoft Word launch a blank file.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\protocolhandler.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:ProtocolHandler.exe) AND (process.command_line:*\"ms\-word* AND process.command_line:*.docx\"*))`
